claim_text: Reuters and CNN reported DOJ sent lawmakers a summary covering over 300 officials and politically exposed persons in Epstein-related records, while stating inclusion in that summary does not itself establish wrongdoing.
Reuters reported DOJ sent lawmakers a Feb. 15, 2026 letter describing redaction rationale and stating four newly discussed individuals were not directly tied to wrongdoing in reviewed records.
AP reported file excerpts described Epstein referencing Nobel committee leadership in outreach messages to high-profile contacts.
AP reported some U.S. school districts paused or canceled Lifetouch sessions after viral posts made Epstein-related allegations.
AP reported Howard Lutnick acknowledged pre-government meetings with Epstein and that prior denials were inaccurate.
AP reported Casey Wasserman planned to sell his talent agency after publication of emails involving Ghislaine Maxwell.
